description: The go implementation of a DSC Resource for the fictional TSToy application.

ensure.title: Ensure configuration file existence
ensure.description: Defines whether the application's configuration file for this scope should exist or not.

scope.title: Target configuration scope
scope.description: Defines which of the application's configuration files the resource should manage.

updateAutomatically.title: Should update automatically
updateAutomatically.description: Indicates whether the application should check for updates when it starts.

updateFrequency.title: Update check frequency
updateFrequency.description: Indicates how many days the application should wait before checking for updates.
